text: Brad Elrod is an American drummer and best recognized as a founding member of the noise rock group Today Is the Day. Brad Elrod formed Today Is the Day in 1992 with guitarist and vocalist Steve Austin, with whom he had performed with in Alien in the Land of our Birth. He released three albums with Today Is the Day: Supernova, Willpower and the self-titled album. In 1997, Elrod left the band to pursue other interests.
